thread.title: Parineeti Chopra down with Priyanka Chopra’s ‘Quantico’ frenzy
thread.title_full: Parineeti Chopra down with Priyanka Chopra’s ‘Quantico’ frenzy

author: Deccan
title: Parineeti Chopra down with Priyanka Chopra’s ‘Quantico’ frenzy
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 05, 2015, 16.58 pm Mumbai: B-town is abuzz with Priyanka Chopra’s much talked Hollywood show ‘Quantico’, which just recently made its debut on Indian Television.
Recently we saw all the bigwigs of Bollywood giving a shout-out to Priyanka Chopra for her show. However, among the supporters, Priyanka’s cousin sister Parineeti’s name was missing which led to a lot of speculations. But guess what? Parineeti is here and she is nothing but absoultely proud of Priyanka.
After catching on Priyanka’s ‘Quantico’, the overjoyed Parineeti rushed to Twitter to express her happiness. She praised Priyanka in series of tweets:
OH MY GO how do you do it EVERY time !!!! Sooo proud of you mimi didi Love you AMAAZIN #QUANTICO GUYS!!! @priyankachopra
— Parineeti Chopra (@ParineetiChopra) October 5, 2015 What you have achieved is unimaginable but I also know that only you could do it!!!! S proud of you!!! #Quantico @priyankachopra
— Parineeti Chopra (@ParineetiChopra) October 5, 2015 There is a new benchmark set for all of us. Why do you make us work so hard!!!! Huh??? Hahahah. Muuua @priyankachopra
— Parineeti Chopra (@ParineetiChopra) October 5, 2015 Priyanka was overwhelmed by her cousin sister's this support and love. Without wasting any further time, the actress responded to her tweets. Priyanka tweeted, "Haha! We have to prove to the world.. the Chopras got it!! @ ParineetiChopra thank u so much baby. Lots of love."
Haha! We have to prove to the world.. the Chopras got it!! @ParineetiChopra thank u so much baby. Lots of love http://t.co/g6YWT4h2Dl
— PRIYANKA (@priyankachopra) October 5, 2015 Tags: entertainment Bollywood Priyanka Chopra Parineeti Chopra Quantico Also Read Cruz along with Dha‘one’ Anushka Sharma celebrates birthday with Ranbir Kapoor at 'Bombay Velvet' screening No intimacy or kissing scenes for Fawad Khan Parineeti Chopra learns scuba diving
